disallowed_deps=["//tensorflow/core:framework",

Since //tensorflow/core:core depends on //tensorflow/core:framework and //tensorflow/core:framework is disallowed, I can't have a custom op depending on //tensorflow/core:core

body:
BTW, the issue with using Bazel to build such op is that the such internal dependencies are disallowed. IE there's this [line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a0d784bdd31b27e013a7eac58a86ba62e86db299/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L701) in tf_custom_op

`             disallowed_deps=["//tensorflow/core:framework",
`

Since `//tensorflow/core:core` depends on `//tensorflow/core:framework` and `//tensorflow/core:framework` is disallowed, I can't have a custom op depending on `//tensorflow/core:core`
